title: 2 Degrees
body:
Hi,

Having trouble logging into LoL, I'm using a mobile 2 degrees that i've just topped up. I can get into the login screen, pt my name+pass in an then nothing happens. Eventually comes up saying there was an error.

Help please.

replies.body:
2 degrees?

Well, nevertheless, have you tried [changing your DNS](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues#wq4)?
